SELECT user_id , password , name , gender, rrn, phone_no , email, role, nickname , profile_image, profile_writing, area1, area2, area3, category1, category2, category3, penalty_type, report_count, stop_start_date, stop_end_date, out_user_state, out_user_date, add_user_type, logout_date, add_user_date, total_visit_count, open_condition, push_condition, join_club_count, join_club_limit FROM users
user_id = LIKE(#{searchKeyword}||'%')
nickname = LIKE(#{searchKeyword}||'%')
penalty_type = #{searchKeyword}
ORDER BY user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, password, name, gender, rrn, phone_no, email, nickname, profile_writing, area1, area2, area3, category1, category2, category3, add_user_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password:VARCHAR}, #{name:VARCHAR}, #{gender:VARCHAR}, #{rrn:VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo:VARCHAR}, #{email:VARCHAR}, #{nickName:VARCHAR}, #{profileWriting:VARCHAR} , #{area1:VARCHAR} , #{area2:VARCHAR} , #{area3:VARCHAR} , #{category1:VARCHAR} , #{category2:VARCHAR} , #{category3:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO users ( user_id, add_user_type, add_user_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{addUserType:CHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id , password , name , gender, rrn, phone_no , email, role, nickname , profile_image, profile_writing, area1, area2, area3, category1, category2, category3, penalty_type, report_count, stop_start_date, stop_end_date, out_user_state, out_user_date, add_user_type, logout_date, add_user_date, total_visit_count, open_condition, push_condition, join_club_count, join_club_limit FROM users Where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user_id , password , name , gender, rrn, phone_no , email, role, nickname , profile_image, profile_writing, area1, area2, area3, category1, category2, category3, penalty_type, report_count, stop_start_date, stop_end_date, out_user_state, out_user_date, add_user_type, logout_date, add_user_date, total_visit_count, open_condition, push_condition, join_club_count, join_club_limit FROM users Where name = #{name} and rrn = #{rrn}
SELECT inner_table.* FROM ( SELECT deep_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM () inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
